byline.original: By KEN BELSON and THE ASSOCIATED PRESS

abstract: Average resale price for 2015 Super Bowl tickets was $10,466.11, more than four times higher than previous year; Seattle Seahawks cornerback Richard Sherman will probably need elbow surgery in off-season.
lead_paragraph: The average price of a game-day ticket on the secondary market was said to be $10,466.11, which is over four times the price of last year’s ticket.

headline.main: Super Bowl’s Ticket Resale Price Shatters a Record

snippet: The average price of a game-day ticket on the secondary market was said to be $10,466.11, which is over four times the price of last year’s ticket.
